about_the_game:
PLEASE VISIT OUR KICKSTARTER! LINK IN THE BASIC INFO SECTION!




Thank you for your interest in the game .



Acras is a new age strategy rpg taking the best from the strategy handheld rpg series and breathing new life into the rpg Genre.
It is a tribute to a lot of our favorite gaming experiences so many of us grew up with.




YO! Fey here, and Welcome to our vibrant exciting world!
ITS SO EXCITING I CAN'T WAIT TO SHOW YOU!





Acras is the 2d Top down Turn based strategy game reminiscent of the Paper Mario and Fire emblem games.
A world filled with vast biome, colorful characters, and ancient secrets wait for you to come and explore them.


Key Features


◆Squad customization Supporting a robust character development system , each class
with 9 possible build paths each with their own spells along with special characters with their own unique spells and build paths.
No person will have the same playthrough or tactics, and neither will the enemies!


◆Oregon trail overworld system- Plan your voyage carefully, and pick up the supplies necessary for your squad, the land can be treacherous to those who arent prepared
to ford the unknown!

◆Trait, and encounter system- Strategy is a major part of this world, and sometimes the world takes its toll on the characters
some things lead to lasting events that change your character, the story and how you play.

◆Story filled with multiple choice paths that affect how the world around you ends up. Meaningful and unique side quests that cast colorful and vibrant characters.
Explore the world of Osaria in the way you like!

◆Pet system which allows you to manage and tame your farm of monsters to yield powerful items and build special bonds with your characters. You'll
never be alone with your chosen companion by your side.

◆Mod support- built to support a large mod community with options to insert and build your own characters, scenarios , worlds, and systems.

  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU

short_description: A High Fantasy top down Strategy RPG. Featuring a colorful and diverse cast of characters, free movement turn based strategy combat, a unique spell and inventory upgrade system, topped of with an engaging and dramatic story. Built from the ground up to support how you like to play your rpg's.
